data.eml:eml: Recent Cyprididae and Ilyocyprididae (Crustacea: Ostracoda) from Lake Biwa, Japan, including a summary of the lake’s ostracod fauna

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smith, Robin J., Janz, Horst, Okubo, Ichiro (2011): Recent Cyprididae and Ilyocyprididae (Crustacea: Ostracoda) from Lake Biwa, Japan, including a summary of the lake’s ostracod fauna. Zootaxa 2874: 1-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205837
